name: RANDOM rooms
description:
A strange creature with a weapon and an enormous dungeon are the two ingredients of a rogue-like.
Explore, discover, face new enemies. Scores of randomly generated rooms wait ahead, hiding the secret of this world.
Can you stand up to the challenge?

Features:
- Randomly generated rooms and whole dungeons
- Huge variety of in-game situations
- Novelty bosses
- Your good old rogue-like
